NO_SIGNAL.name: [PRESET] NO SIGNAL
NO_SIGNAL.description: Used to identify no signal screen pages in videos

BLUE_SCREEN.name: [PRESET] BLUE SCREEN
BLUE_SCREEN.description: Used to identify blue screen pages in videos

notes.regionConfig: Region configuration for partial image comparison. When enabled=true, only the specified region will be used for fingerprint calculation.
notes.alignment: Supported alignment values: top-left, top-center, top-right, center-left, center, center-right, bottom-left, bottom-center, bottom-right
notes.width: Width in pixels, null means use full image width
notes.height: Height in pixels, null means use full image height
notes.threshold: SSIM similarity threshold (0.0-1.0), higher values require more similarity for matching
